name: The Alchemist (itch) (onthefly)
description:
This is my very first PyGame project and my very first videogame, it was created in approximately 2 weeks as a PoC and a way to experiment and create know-how about Games releasing process. All feedback is welcome.

 Challenge your friends, your cat, who knows!

Hope you enjoy it!!

Artwork: https://0x72.itch.io/
